DOC.brief_summary: Phase II MOMS Partnership aim : 1. conduct need assessment mental health mother reside New Haven , CT ; 2. provide on-site group intervention service ( randomized housing community ) improve signs/symptoms depression/stress/trauma among mother live onsite .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose project expand enhance New Haven Mental health Outreach Mothers ( MOMs ) Coalition beyond pregnancy depression include broad definition mental illness ( depressive , anxiety , substance use disorder ) , large target population ( low-income , racially ethnically diverse , pregnant parent woman ) City New Haven . Through expansion , Coalition bring together community woman , family advocate , healthcare provider , policy agency leader , academic , inform development conduct public health approach around mental health low-income , racially ethnically diverse , pregnant parent woman . The specific goal Phase I proposal : 1 . To conduct community-led need assessment mental health low-income , ethnically racially diverse pregnant parent woman City New Haven . 2 . To provide randomize intervention service improve signs/symptoms depression/stress/trauma among mother live public housing New Haven , CT
DOC.criteria: CESD score > =16 Child age 18 ( participant must mother ) Resident public housing authority complex New Haven , CT affiliate Section 8 recipient Positive psychosis Active suicidal ideation NonEnglish Spanish speaker Unable provide inform consent Unwilling accept randomization Moving within intervention & followup period
